db:info.db:title: Qt Wayland Compositor Examples - IVI Compositor

db:abstract.db:para: IVI Compositor is an example that demonstrates how to use the IviApplication extension.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += gui qml
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
OTHER_FILES = \ main.qml
RESOURCES += ivi-compositor.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/wayland/ivi-compositor sources.files = $$SOURCES $$HEADERS $$RESOURCES $$FORMS ivi-compositor.pro sources.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/wayland/ivi-compositor INSTALLS += target sources
